label: Motion Detection [Alexa]
info: Enables and disables motion detection depending on the room you are in.

label: Light/Fan Control [Alexa]
info:
1) Turns lights on and off per the room you are in.
2) Turns the fans on and off per the room you are in.

name: Alexa Device Handler
info: This subflow takes a Alexa Device Activity payload and checks which Echo device it came from and directs the message accordingly.
